conclusion: Plan to analyze image and reason shadow changes due to light source movement.
Image shows a green surface with four objects: cylinder with red cross, round object with pinkish substance, small circular object, thin rod; each casts a shadow labeled A, B, C, D.
A is the shadow of the cylinder.
B is the shadow of the round object.
C is the shadow of the small circular object.
D is the shadow of the thin rod.
The light source moves from the left to the back right.
Shadows will shift towards the right as the light source moves.
Shadows will become larger because the light source is moving further away from the objects.
Shadows will move to the right and become larger as the light source moves to the back right.
